#include<iostream>
#include<cmath>
#include <string>
#include<algorithm>
//#pragma warning (disable : 4996)
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;


int main()
{
	//freopen("input.txt", "r", stdin);
	//freopen("output.txt", "w", stdout);
	ll t;
	cin >> t;
	while (t--)
	{
		string s,s1;
		int a[28] = { 0 }, b[28] = { 0 }, i;
		cin >> s >> s1;
		for (i = 0; i < s.size(); i++)
			a[s[i] - 'a']++;
		for (i = 0; i < s1.size(); i++)
			b[s1[i] - 'a']++;
		for (i = 0; i < 26; i++)
		{
			if (a[i] != b[i])
				break;
		}
		if (i == 26)
			cout << "YES" << endl;
		else
			cout << "NO" << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
